entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
